attributes.action: put in place a one car per household policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: a one car per household policy is needed to stop the congestion on the roads. this is a fair way to stop congestion,and would be cheaper to enforce as the DVLA would have all the details of the house and car owners all ready

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
